Hi.

Jim

Posted By: Mike (18colt)
If interested, I have an SGC 10 of Leach (fielding).  Back is ugly, but it's a Uzit.  Shoot me an e-mail (I check it every few days, so thanks for the patience).  I can send scans.

Mike (18colt)
